mainParagraph1.message: The value used here will prefix the download filename. You probably want to end this in /, not doing so will modify the filename of the downloaded images.

mainParagraph2.message: For example setting 'folder/name' and downloading 'image.jpg' will create 'nameimage.jpg' in the directory called 'folder'.

path_contains_invalid_characters.message: Your prefix contains invalid characters and can't be saved, please check it.
